Wand, common (requires attunement by a druid)
You can use this wand as a spellcasting focus. The wand has 3 charges and regains all expended charges daily at dawn. When you cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Qf6CAZkc7ms4ZY3e]{goodberry} spell while using this wand as your spellcasting focus, you can expend 1 of the wandâ€™s charges to transform the berries into hazelnuts, which restore 2 hit points instead of 1. The spell is otherwise unchanged. In addition, when you cast a spell that deals lightning damage while using this wand as your spellcasting focus, the spell deals 1 extra lightning damage.
